info.name: TeamCity - Altered Carbon
info.description:
This is for the new teamcity experimental UI, in the 2019 release.
2023 update is for the new interface dropped, text is blurred in both screen shots.
March 16th 2023 a few more tweaks for base colors, adjusting some colors with a single hue

If you can handle hex colors, you can change all the base colors
